data.title: WarnerBros.com
data.text:
If you are interested in attending a live taping of your favorite show, your best bet would be to visit www.tvtickets.com where you will find all the information you need. For tickets to the Ellen Degeneres show, visit http://send.ellentv.com/tickets/.

Warner Bros. Entertainmentâ€™s policy, as established by its Legal Department, prohibits considering any film, television or other story material unless it is submitted by a licensed literary agent who is signatory to the Writers Guild Of America. If you are interested in obtaining a list of accredited agents, call The Writers Guild at 323-951-4000 or email them through their website at www.wga.org.

Please review our Clip and Still Licensing page and contact our clip and still department at clipandstilldept@warnerbros.com.
